analysis.description:
PEC (/unique_chucks/11/0x8e4e0a8c678987a8462f0a21c58b118c31897118.sol#255-281) has incorrect ERC20 function interface(s):
	-transfer (/unique_chucks/11/0x8e4e0a8c678987a8462f0a21c58b118c31897118.sol#269-281)

PEC.fallback (/unique_chucks/11/0x8e4e0a8c678987a8462f0a21c58b118c31897118.sol#257-269) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool)(ico_open_time < block.timestamp && ico_closed_time > block.timestamp) (/unique_chucks/11/0x8e4e0a8c678987a8462f0a21c58b118c31897118.sol#258-259)

PEC.transfer (/unique_chucks/11/0x8e4e0a8c678987a8462f0a21c58b118c31897118.sol#269-281) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool)(tempLockedAddress[msg.sender] < block.timestamp) (/unique_chucks/11/0x8e4e0a8c678987a8462f0a21c58b118c31897118.sol#275-278)

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/11/0x8e4e0a8c678987a8462f0a21c58b118c31897118.sol:
